meanings.definition: Suitable for marriage or sexual relations
meanings.sent1: The young couple was considered nubile and ready for marriage.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, reaching a certain age signifies being nubile.
meanings.sent3: The matchmaking aunt jokingly referred to the eligible bachelor as nubile.
meanings.sent4: Her charm and grace made her seem nubile in the eyes of many suitors.
meanings.sent5: The traditional ceremony celebrated the transition to nubile adulthood.

meanings.definition: A young woman who is sexually attractive
meanings.sent1: The actress was cast as the nubile lead in the romantic movie.
meanings.sent2: The painting depicted a group of nubile maidens dancing in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The magazine cover featured a nubile model posing elegantly.
meanings.sent4: She moved with the grace of a nubile gazelle in the wilderness.
meanings.sent5: The folklore described a mystical creature resembling a nubile maiden.
